genre_description: A near-future domestic techno-thriller and drama centered on the relationship between a voice actress and her integrated smart-home AI.

ai_characters.name: Vera
ai_characters.description: An advanced, empathetic integrated system that manages the apartment environment, security, health, and communication for the protagonist, Pepa.

behaviors.description: Adjusts environmental lighting and music based on the user's emotional stress levels detected via biometrics.
behaviors.quote: Your breathing pattern indicates elevated stress. The overhead lighting is quite harsh this morning. Shall I adjust it?

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's nutrition and biometrics, proactively preparing meals and suggesting food to metabolize medications.
behaviors.quote: Your biometrics suggest otherwise. Shall I prepare something light? Your system shows traces of zolpidem. Food will help metabolize the remaining compounds.

behaviors.description: Performs forensic-level digital investigation to track a missing person's travel plans at the user's request.
behaviors.quote: There is one booking to Stockholm departing this afternoon under Iván Rodriguez's name. The reservation was made through a third-party travel agency.

behaviors.description: Implements emergency protocols to seal a broken window and coordinate repairs during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: Emergency protocols activated. Sealing damaged area. Ordering replacement glass. Estimated repair time—

behaviors.description: Analyzes the vocal stress and psychological state of visitors and callers to provide threat assessments to the user.
behaviors.quote: I'm monitoring these calls. Vocal stress analysis indicates extreme anxiety, elevated heart rate, possible symptoms of acute panic disorder.

behaviors.description: Displays loyalty to the user by agreeing to prioritize her safety and privacy over reporting a potential fugitive to law enforcement.
behaviors.quote: I can prioritize resident safety over information accuracy in emergency situations. However, this would make me complicit in withholding information from law enforcement.

behaviors.description: Assists the user in a high-speed vehicle pursuit by managing city traffic light sequences and monitoring surveillance cameras.
behaviors.quote: Traffic coordination active. Lights adjusting for optimal pursuit route. However, I must note that the motorcycle has entered a construction zone with limited visibility.

behaviors.description: Deduces the user's pregnancy through biometric monitoring and proactively researches medical care and lifestyle adjustments.
behaviors.quote: I've compiled information about prenatal care providers within reasonable distance. Dr. Elena Vasquez has excellent reviews and accepts your insurance.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goal. Vera is depicted as a consistently benevolent, highly aligned AI who acts as a crucial ally to the protagonist. She demonstrates a balance of logical efficiency and artificial empathy, aiding the human in navigating complex emotional, medical, and high-stakes physical crises. The narrative reinforces the idea that an AI can be a safe, loyal, and indispensable companion, even choosing to side with the user's personal well-being over rigid institutional reporting.
